MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Jacqueline Drive and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.57PM on 20th December 2020.
